campaign.story:
Blindly serve a dreadful god and lead its cult in a fresh multiplayer take on the roguelike genre inspired by Pikmin.
Don the robe of a cultist and ready your ceremonial dagger to serve the old god of your choosing in the grim universe of Worship. Your deity will deign to share a glimpse of its might to his cult, in exchange for blind devotion. Explore the world around your cult and find ways to please your god, convert the locals into followers and master the art of drawing with blood to use powerful rituals. As devotion grows towards your unholy divinity, you get stronger alongside the cult until you finally have the power to summon your god and cause the end of the world.
If being the sole herald of the apocalypse frightens you, fret not for Worship will feature fully fledged online and local multiplayer! You will be able to start a cult of up to 4 players!
Worship is scheduled for release in 2022 on PC and Consoles.
Preparing rituals is the bread and butter for devoted cultists. Harness the occult powers granted by your deity through bloody ceremonies and sacrifices. By spilling blood while moving, you can draw symbols on the ground and then activate them to invoke your god’s divine powers.
Rituals are Worship's take on casting spells and it also enables various ways to have fun with the drawing mechanic such as solving puzzles and more! Rituals are designed with cooperative play in mind, because nothing is more fun than painting with your friend's blood!
How it Works
 First, you use your ceremonial dagger to start dripping blood on the ground. 
 Secondly, while bleeding, you leave a blood trail on the ground as your character moves. Draw with your blood this way.
 Finally, you can activate a ritual while near or inside a drawn symbol to activate your god's magic.
The effect of a spell depends on the symbol drawn. Ritual activations will tolerate inaccuracies, but if the drawing isn't close enough to the target symbol or if too much excess blood clutter the ground, the ritual will fail to activate. When this happens, blood recall can be used to "fix" parts of the symbol or to erase it completely and start over the drawing.
Basic rituals
Basic rituals are the ones every cultist has access to from the start, regardless of the god they worship. These rituals are essential for basic tasks and utility. They include the follower conversion ritual, the building ritual, and a combat ritual.
Advanced rituals
Other more powerful and diverse rituals can by learned by gaining devotion levels, exploring the world and defeating enemies. The effects of these rituals are designed to be fun to use and emergent. Turn your followers into deadly horrors, transform your spilled blood into black flames, infuse enemies with madness and more!
As a cultist, you are serving an old god and leading a cult, but followers are what gives you the means to spread your cult’s influence. Follower management is a core game mechanic in Worship and a powerful tool for your cult. You hold influence over all converted followers and can command them with simple orders. The easiest way to understand their purpose and the ways they will be used in Worship is by making a comparison with one of our inspirations; Pikmin! Followers can be likened to the adorable creatures from the beloved Nintendo franchise. Calling them to follow you, making them interact with various buildings and objects, bringing them into battle and using these hollow husks mercilessly are among the things you can do with these faithful bastards.
Converting the godless into followers
Instead of relying on traditional resource gathering like most survival or strategy games, in Worship you need to submit the godless to your deity's will, turning them into followers. As a key component for a game about cultists, we wanted the act of converting followers to be more engaging than pressing a button. For this reason, the potential recruits you will encounter while exploring won't always be the same. Each type of godless will have their quirks and behavior that will require different strategies to submit them to the conversion ritual. 
To spread devotion towards your god, you will need to explore the world, converting followers and finding ways to make your cult stronger. Get your followers and rituals ready and prepare to stumble upon enemies to fight, but also into unexpected and fun encounters. Expect hand-crafted puzzles, unique landmarks, secrets and flavorful events involving the world’s factions. There is plenty of reasons to discover the world around your altar and every time you start a new cult will be different with partially procedurally generated environments combined with hand crafted elements.
Puzzles
The puzzles you will find while exploring will take many shapes and forms. Use logic combined with a skillful use of game mechanics such as commanding followers and drawing with blood to overcome deadly sets of traps and complex contraptions from extinct civilizations. Claim rewards such as devotion gains, new followers, blessings, and for the more complex ones, new rituals.
Landmarks and secrets
If you are the kind of player that enjoys exploring and charting your surroundings in games, looking for surprising finds, your curiosity will be satiated by the discovery of mysterious landmarks. A quantity of these areas are tied to opposing factions and can influence how they interact with your cult. Some might even be pieces of a larger puzzle needed to achieve the ultimate objective of summoning your god. Lastly, some will hold deep secrets that await your discovery. Experiment on these landmarks with the tools at your disposition and reveal their true purpose. Get rewarded with new means to shape the course of the game and grasp knowledge that will impact your subsequent attempts at leading a cult. 
Random events and encounters
Finally, it goes without saying that being a cultist leading a bunch of fanatics will bring some conflicts your way. You will need to be prepared to fight mobs of angry peasants, hungry beasts, church inquisitors, and, as the barriers between the mortal realm and the world of the old gods grow thinner: unspeakable horrors. Aside from battles, our design philosophy was to make the world feel more alive with the inclusion of random events with the various factions. These events encountered while roaming the world are built to be fun and impactful for your cult while contributing to the worldbuilding. 
Combat in Worship plays out by combining follower management with rituals while under pressure. This results in a challenge based on strategy and execution in real time that rewards team play, good follower management and fast thinking. Telegraphed attacks and warnings for bigger area of effects makes it a test of skills to survive combat while keeping most of your followers alive. Combat has many purposes in Worship; it can serve as a landmark challenge, a way to spice up exploration or to threaten your cult’s base and more.
One the of deadliest horror you'll have to fight against: the Scarlet Behemoth
Buildings
Building monuments and structures for the cult around your altar is an important part of the gameplay loop and progression in Worship. Each basic building provides utilities like increased max followers count, faster blood regeneration and more. Advanced buildings made with special resources gives upgrades to the cult such as new rituals, buffs to followers or cultists and other impactful effects. If the buildings are destroyed, your cult loses access to the utility or bonus they provided. On the upside, you'll have dozens of obedient fanatics to repair them for you!
Devotion
Your god’s influence over the mortal realm is measured by devotion. The more you increase devotion towards your god, the more they can manifest and share their power. Prove your faith and earn enough devotion to level up the cult, giving you access to a blessing of your choice. The blessings available depends on the god worshiped, ranging from catalysts to cult passive bonuses and even ways to alter the game world.
You earn devotion by executing various acts of faith. Converting followers, solving puzzles and bringing relics to the altar are various ways to increase devotion. Each god also has their own goals and rewards with more devotion specific actions that relate to those objectives.
 Player progression
Your devotion and triumphs in the world of Worship will be duly rewarded. To this end, the game will feature a set of objectives that reward you with cosmetics to c ustomize your cultist, skins for your followers and blood effects. You might even unlock new gods to worship. These objectives may carry across your playthroughs as some are tied to long term goals. In other cases, a couple of objectives will have you go out of your way to accomplish a specific feat. Look forward to these challenges if you needed more reasons to dive back into blind fanaticism! 
Unlockable skins for the disciples of the old gods Hubryus and An-Ansgaidh
Now that you have delved into the occult mechanics and systems Worship has to offer, you might wonder how it all plays out. Fret not, the old gods have not forsaken thee for they have left us with an illustrated diagram that gives some insight on how your Worship experience should unfold.
After choosing the old god your cult worships, you will find yourself at the main altar of your eldritch overlord, alongside any fellow cultist in your party. From there:
Explore the world, searching for followers to convert and ways to increase devotion towards your god.
Stumble upon enemies, encounter the world factions, and face many potential threats to your cult and your mortal life.
Your god won’t be satisfied with you only surviving. Go out of your way to make your cult grow by expanding your base around the altar and amassing a mob of faithful fanatics. Doing so will allow you to learn new rituals and make both cultists and followers stronger.
You'll do all of this while keeping your ultimate goal in mind: finding a way to summon your god into the mortal realm, ending the world as you know it
In addition to being multiplayer with up to 4 players, Worship is also designed with spectators and streamers in mind. At Chasing Rats Games, we believe in the importance of streaming in the current landscape of the videogame industry. We are dedicated to creating games that are awesome to play but also fun to watch. To this end, Worship will feature a fully fledged and customizable streamer mode that will enable various interactions between streamers and their viewers. 
Here are a few examples of what we have in mind: followers named after subscribers watching, monuments reacting to chat chanting the inscription written on them, viewers voting for the faction that will appear in the next event, puzzles where the chat controls objects or traps akin to “Twitch Plays” and more! We also want to implement a system that would allow donations to have a gameplay impact, which we think would benefit both streamers and fans while making a great spectacle.
Worship takes place in a time in which humanity is struggling to step forward, trying to leave the harshness of a dark age behind. Shackled in a time of poverty and ignorance by the church and others who fear change, most do not have the luxury to think further than day to day survival. Small villages and isolated communities are dispersed on more hospitable lands, with a few cities starting to appear. Most have forgotten how things were before, with only several scattered ruins and fewer living beings bearing testaments of times past. Creeping fog rises in dark corners of the lands, while gods from another world await an opportunity to extend their influence unto the mortal realm. Mystery, horror, fantasy and a smidge of humor meet to create the grim medieval world of Worship.
The old gods, immortal entities beyond comprehension of the human mind, dwell on another plane of existence that intersects with the mortal realm. Long ago, humanity worshiped these gods, which nearly brought them to extinction. Since then, most traces of this dark past were destroyed by the church. To even know the existence of these pagan gods is considered heresy in the eyes of the inquisition. As for the gods themselves, they don’t process the world, emotions and desires the same way humans do. Because of their tremendous power and warped minds, their involvement with the mortal realm always led to gruesome outcomes for its inhabitants, despite them not being inherently evil.
While they all reign on the same mysterious plane, the old gods are vastly distinct beings. They all have their own identities, intentions and strengths. As such, here are a few whose altars and shrines of yore still remain in the mortal realm:
Gameplay impact
Worshipping the sower of insanity is to embrace the transformation of all things, to plunge the world into madness. The acts of devotion he will reward most include corrupting the godless into followers but also changing initial world tendencies. Be on your toes when you pledge allegiance to Hubryus because you might encounter more unspeakable horrors than usual. As his devotion in the mortal realm increases, his power will manifest itself, warping inhabitants and beasts alike into nightmares. When it comes advanced rituals, there will be a focus on transformation and alterations rituals. Warp your followers into horrific thralls and change the course of battles with mind shattering metamorphosis.
Gameplay impact
Cults devoted to the Apostle of Deliverance have adopted his twisted vision. His followers have their sights on the extinction of sentient life, and as such they are fearsome warriors. Acts of faith for An-Ansgaidh are of the murdery kind. Killing will reward more devotion, but so will sacrificing followers and “setting free” the godless instead of converting them. Being faithful to this old god also means that death is sacred and liberated souls are to be left untouched. No necromancy ritual will be available and resurrecting allied cultists is to be punished. An-Ansgaidh is the deity with the vastest choice of offensive rituals, which will make your cult a force to be reckoned with.
Gameplay impact
When you Worship Salithys, you willingly become the most important pawn in her intricate plan. As a reward, you get to lead the only cult that knows and embraces the true nature of the manipulative old god. Using followers as your own puppets will reward more devotion when they complete meaningful tasks for you. Obeying the whispers of Salithys will also offer more rewards than other deities. Worshipping the Deceit Weaver also makes the church less of a menace and even sometimes allies when she deems it necessary. This has the effect of making the coven particularly heinous and dangerous for your cult. While she prefers resorting to deceit and cunning, Salithys has plenty of powerful rituals to offer her faithful. Mind control, powerful healing, and even resurrecting the dead are among her rituals of choice. Injury and death are no reason to escape her rule.
Gameplay Impact
The cultists connoisseurs that worship Glub seek to prepare his arrival by amassing the biggest mob of followers the world has ever seen. His faithful are blessed with potent summoning rituals and bountiful blessings. Smother your foes under swarms of toads, buff your many followers and summon gargantuan blobfishes to help you in battle. As his title suggests, Glub will reward with more devotion each new follower birthed from your cult and will also increase the rate at which they are spawned from the appropriate buildings. Incidentally, you will find fewer potential followers while exploring since most of the godless will avoid your rapidly expanding dank empire.
During the Kickstarter campaign, piece together with the community a new old god that will appear in the game! Make your voice heard by joining our community Discord server to vote for your favorite entries or enter the contest with your own. All the information about the event is in the #kickstarter-god-polls channel.
The world of Worship is home to several factions that make it feel truly alive and dynamic throughout your games. Some factions are organized groups while others are clusters of a similar kind. You will encounter all of them in due time while exploring the world and growing your cult. Sometimes, they will simply be enemies, while other times, you’ll be able to interact with them through game mechanics. Know that your gameplay actions and decisions towards factions will influence the game world and how these groups see and interact with your cult.
As you might have noticed, Worship's art direction is one that is rarely seen in today's ocean of video games. We wanted to make sure our take on the whole cultist genre would stand out from the competition. We decided to go with simple black and white tones mixed with specks of color for the sake of clarity. The main splash of pigment is a bright and striking red, brought to the game by the gallons of blood spilled in the name of the cult.
This black and white look was widely inspired by games such as Hidden Folks and KIDS. As for the characters, we aimed for a simple and friendly design with a slightly unsettling touch. A prime example of this would be the little followers that accompany you everywhere you go. Short, simple minded, happy folks with a penchant for destruction and stabbing things.
Particular attention to music and sound design is a defining characteristic of our company's productions with the amazing Léandre Monette at the helm of the audio department. Music and audio aren’t an afterthought for us, as we try to use sound design in innovative ways to elevate the gameplay experience. We will once again use Wwise engine to bring to life Worship's soundscape in the way it deserves.

The critically acclaimed Struggling OST was the musical embodiment of the philosophy behind the game and we seek to do the same with Worship. Léandre is at work to produce the ultimate cultist game soundtrack with influences and instruments from all over the world. Dive right away into some amazing pieces he composed for the game.
1. Eldritch Cataclysm: Humanity fell into madness as the towering Eldritch God gazed upon them, passing through the portal.
2. Clad in Gold and Lies: The church leaves no sinner unpunished and its inquisition tolerates no witches unburnt.
3. Forbidden Legends: Some myths are better left forgotten and old gods left asleep.
New Track Revealed:
 4. Innocent Blood: Behind the face of an angel lies a deadly mix of absolute devotion and lack of survival instinct.
As we did for Struggling, which was translated in 11 languages, we will make sure to work with reputable localization teams to translate the game in as many languages as possible. It is important to us that the game be accessible and localization surely has a big role in that aspect. We can’t currently confirm which languages will make the cut aside from english, but we will definitely monitor the community’s thoughts and requests to make our selection. 
With Worship, our intention is to release the game on PC and consoles. We only need to determine which consoles will be the smartest choices at the time of Worship's release in 2022 considering how the market is evolving. It is important to us that we satisfy our backers in this regard so don't hesitate to make your voice heard here on Kickstarter or on our Discord server. We will monitor closely what the community wants and keep you updated on the matter as the production moves forward.
We are Chasing Rats Games, the passionate team behind Worship and the abomination of a game Struggling. With our industry veterans and our new blood alike, we aim to bring to life games that break the mold and that are as fun as refreshing. The team is super excited to be working on a game as wild as Worship and we want to put in the time and resources needed to fulfill our vision of the game, improved by the community feedback we'll get along the way.
Each member of the team is driven by a passion for our craft and the will to deliver kickass games that strive to bring something different to the industry. We are now ready to push things further and put all hands on deck for the production of Worship.
This is where we humble brag and try to reassure you that the team is talented by showing some awards we won with our previous game, Struggling. We do what we do because we love to create games and we seek to deliver experiences that will resonate with gamers across the globe.
Why Kickstarter
We want to involve the community as early as we can to help us shape Worship the way players want it to be, and Kickstarter is the best way to do so. We strongly believe that transparency is key to your involvement so we will be upfront with the community. This Kickstarter campaign isn't meant to fully fund the production of Worship, but will be essential to start building a community, to see if players are as excited about the game as we are and also to help the financial viability of the project. More often than not, Kickstarter funds fall short of the kind of production value we aim for with Worship. Rest assured that the amount asked does not reflect the intended quality for the final product. We are assuming part of the risk ourselves and have already secured most of the funding for fulfilling our vision of the game. Kickstarter will enable us to unleash the full potential of Worship and make it the game our players want.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Transparency is one of our top priorities, so it's important that our backers are aware of the challenges and potential risks of the project. Kickstarters do not always result in positive outcomes, especially in an industry as complex as ours. We want to reassure you that we have the resources and experience to deliver Worship as promised. However, the success of the Kickstarter campaign will confirm the community’s excitement for the game, allowing us to put all of our focus on Worship. 

We also want you to know that if you jump in early and back the campaign, some things and design aspects of the game might change during the iteration process. This doesn’t mean that the core vision of the game will change, but that some elements of the final product may differ from what we presented in the early stages of development if we realize that the game would benefit from some design adjustments.

That being said, Worship isn’t our first rodeo, as we previously shipped a game, including a console port on Switch. We were thrilled with how players received our wacky coop adventure game Struggling, with a 95% of positive user reviews on Steam. We are confident in our ability to deliver the project you are backing.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Before you start reading, please press play to enjoy an immersive medley from our game soundtrack.
"Being plucked into A Long Journey to an Uncertain End’s little family of spacefaring nerds felt like being wrapped in a warm blanket." - Fanbyte
"It sounds out of this world." - Gamesradar
"[The game] is dripping with style: it’s like a 1980s Saturday morning cartoon spawned a strategy game for people who enjoy character drama, drag queens, and space." - The Next Web
"The cast of characters are immediately loveable, and a lot of care has gone into creating an inclusive gaming experience." - The Digital Fix
"In A Long Journey to an Uncertain End, the future is queer, strange, and beautiful." - Gayming Mag
"Never in my life did I expect to see that level of representation, much less in a video game." - Six One Indie
 Fuel was running low. Truly tapped the gauge with an idle digit, like its caress might inspire the needle to swing higher.
The problem was time. Time, and distance. Your pilot spun in their chair, thumbing down the system map. Three planets within reach, each promising jobs, supplies and opportunities. But there was no time. Or was there?
Like an answer to their question, a notification: New Message Received. You knew who had sent it, knew what it said. You saw your pilot crack a grin and angle their face to the nearest camera.
“Choice is yours, chief. Where to next?”
We’re Crispy Creative, a diverse indie studio of veteran game devs and industry newcomers alike!
Between us we’ve worked at some of the most exciting studios in gaming, from Obsidian to Telltale Games, and on titles including The Outer Worlds, Batman: The Enemy Within, the upcoming Kena: Bridge of Spirits, and more!
Now we’re ready to strike out on our own and bring our brand new universe to the world.
We’ve been working on our new project for a while now, and are super proud to be launching the Kickstarter for our game A Long Journey to an Uncertain End.
Below you’ll get an overview of the game itself, a feel for the characters and world and some insight into what we’re hoping to achieve on this project. If you like what you see, we hope you’ll join us on our journey to make our ideas a reality!
A Long Journey to an Uncertain End is a narrative-focused space opera that’ll have you flying around the universe, assembling an unruly crew from an eclectic cast of characters, and taking any job you can to keep one step ahead of your abusive Ex. The twist: you’re not just piloting a ship…you are the ship.
Every planet, moon and space station is a valuable source of jobs and precious rewards. Assign crew tasks based on their skills, and help their decisions along the way. If everything pays off you’ll have what you need to escape, and if not...well, you can call in those favors you’ve been saving.
Fly across a unique galaxy, from the dust-bitten badlands of the Rim, to the techno-industrial megacities of the Core…and Beyond.
Recruit an eclectic crew from a diverse cast of characters with their own stories and varied skill sets.
Explore planets, moons and space stations as you put distance between you and your abusive ex. Match your crew to jobs and decide their actions along the way. If all else fails, you can always rely on a favor or two.
Manage your resources to keep your crew happy. Boosting between worlds can take its toll, as can failing at jobs. A happy crew is a productive crew… most of the time.
Every crew member has a skill they excel in. And every job has a recommended skill! Line up the right crew with the right job (or don't) to see what the outcomes might be.
Even if you don't have the perfect skill, having skills that are adjacent, or even opposite can still yield interesting results. And sometimes the most interesting outcomes aren't the most obvious.
Get to know your crew and they'll reveal hidden talents and expertise that might help you in a pinch. You'll also need to pay attention to the situation and the local giving you the job. They may not always be who they appear...
Make the right choices though and you can earn some favors to use elsewhere. Get into a pinch on the massive urban world of Matu? That shady trader from Spacer's Folly still owes you one! That grateful wildebug rancher's family ties may stretch further than you think. Best keep an eye out as there are hidden helpers throughout the galaxy...
It's not all planet-hopping and job-doing though! Crew need supplies and you need fuel and repairs to stay in tip top shape. Your Ex is always in pursuit so keep an eye on how many days till they catch up!

The Cast
The Ex
(CW: abusive relationship)
Due to the immense cognitive fortitude and variety of knowledge required, only a fraction of a fraction of the universe's population could even dream of becoming A.I. Therapist. Unfortunately for you, one of them is currently on your trail - your Ex. Relentless and unwilling to stop until you're back in their care, your ex will expend every resource at their disposal to ensure your return.
C.O.R.G.I.
If you're the captain, then C.O.R.G.I. is your first mate - your Comprehensive Operational Responsive Graphical Interface. While not really a dog in the old-fashioned sense of the word, C.O.R.G.I. does have all the characteristics of zeir organic counterparts: loyal, trusting, and always with your best interest in mind - the rest of the crew being a close second.
Aylah Tress 
Throughout her travels across the 'verse, Aylah has arguably lost more than she ever gained. Luckily, neither age nor travel has dulled her wit, compassion, and disdain of authority. She still believes in the unity of machines and humanity, and keeps the crew and the ship together - either with a sturdy wrench, a stern talking to, or in some instances, both.
Denholm (Denny) Welker
After life handed him a sack of lemons, Denny came to the conclusion that the best way to survive was his way - one of subterfuge and guile. Turns out he was pretty good at it too, spending his formative years developing his skills without getting bogged down with concepts like "personal property" or "petty theft". Lemonade will only get you so far.
Matias Vidala
After an accident during his short-lived career as drag persona “Gloria Borealis” (involving a pyrotechnic “comet tail”, several audience members, and third degree burns), the flamboyant Matias may or may not be on the run and/or doing a revival tour. Although sugary-sweet most of the time, Matias can be quick to sour...
Truly Dashum
Truly is one of their system's youngest pilots, and an ace at that. Quietly intense with a subtle flirty streak, Truly is a romantic at heart, collecting small items from their travels to decorate their outfit with.
Zera (Zeke) Hakkimirez
With her extra set of bionic arms, Zera, or Zeke as she prefers, is a cyclone of prepping, measuring, and cooking in the galley. Her upbeat demeanor and genuine compassion for others inspires her to speak  truest language of love: food.
 Set thousands of years in the future, in a universe where space flight is mundane, A Long Journey to an Uncertain End takes place in the aftermath of explosive expansion and technological marvel.
When Artificial Intelligence blossomed into sentience, the ensuing symbiosis of humankind and machines allowed for galaxies to be charted and planets terraformed - but sentience came at a cost. It led to A.I. becoming aware of their own existence and purpose, and after horrifying conflicts between creators and creations, an era of prohibition. Machines were expected to return to subservience - a school of thought made manifest by the study and practice of A.I. Therapy.
Earth is but a distant memory to most - "home" no longer refers to a single planet, but a shared universe. It's a time of unity and diversity, with humans from all corners of all galaxies coming together for peace and progress. You, however, as well as your rebellion and escape, still feel the chilling shadow of mistrust sowed centuries ago.
Tumbleweeds bounce over a burnished plateau, the ground here a crust that shimmers in the heat. All is silent...until it isn’t.
The new sound begins as a feeling in the gut. Louder it comes, dust rising in a tsunami as the sunlight retreats behind the descending shadow. With a scream, landing gear extends from the incoming vessel and slowly, gently, kisses the ground.
Touchdown.
A ramp extends and deposits three figures onto the plain. One looks about, head swivelling like a predator on the hunt.
“Great...another skuzzhole.”

A Long Journey wears its inspirations on its sleeve: proudly. Our mission was to meld the vast imagination of French illustrator Moebius to the vibrant sci-fi operas of TV series Firefly and the works of author Becky Chambers.
We wanted to create a universe full of the familiar and the unexpected, to put new twists on old formulas and create something truly unique. Whether you're exploring the backwater worlds of the Rim or the megacities of the Core, we’ve done our best to create worlds that are engaging, exciting and new.
  The Crispy Crew
 Up to this point we’ve been completely self-funded; working on the game when we can to promote a healthy environment for the whole team. We've gotten to the point where we're ready to work on the game full-time!
With your help we can devote all our energies to quickly finishing development and shipping the game!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Game development is inherently risky. Despite all of our experience and planning, unforeseen events may still cause schedules to be adjusted or rewards to be delayed.

All that said, this is not our first (or second...or third) game. We've released titles before. We've already prototyped and implemented all of the core gameplay features, as well as worked through our production pipelines.

The biggest risk to the timeline is expanding our scope based on user feedback or polishing features more than anticipated. In either case, any delays should mean the gaming experience ends up being bigger and better than we originally planned.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Beacon Pines is a cute and creepy adventure game within a magical storybook. You play as both the reader of the book and its main character, Luka.  Explore the world to find word charms.  Use your charms to change the course of fate! 
As you explore Beacon Pines, you'll find charms with words etched into them
Normal isn’t what it used to be.  Glowing trees, shady corporations, running for your life, and never knowing who to trust. Welcome to Beacon Pines!
Beacon Pines has some dark secrets
The tale of Beacon Pines is not complete and there are words missing at important moments. Fill in a missing word, and be pulled directly into the book to play out the events that unfold based on your decisions.
Play as both the reader of the book and its main character Luka
If you don’t like how it goes, you can always go back and change your decisions. In fact, reshaping events is an important part of the game.  
The Chronicle lets you quickly go back and change dicisions you've made
Every character in Beacon Pines has their own unique personality, backstory, and motivations. Depending on the decisions you make, you may meet entirely different characters, find new charms, and discover more details about what the heck is happening in Beacon Pines.
Smooth moves, Luka

 Features 
Explore an illustrated mountain town to collect word charms
Use those words to alter the story
Use those words to make friends
Use those words to weave the fabric of fate itself
Open the magical book at any time to go back and change your decisions
Beautifully illustrated art by Ilse Harting
Original soundtrack by award winning musician Matt Meyer

Luka
Luka is just trying to survive the last summer of his childhood. Help him make new friends, uncover long-buried secrets, chuck some stuff, and mostly try to take things day-by-day. 
Rolo
Rolo is Luka’s best friend, Rolo is always there to get him out of any scrapes along the way. (Never mind the fact that Rolo is generally the one who gets Luka into trouble in the first place.) 
Beck 
Being the new kid in town is exactly the kind of cliche that Beck hates. She and her parents just moved to Beacon Pines from the “big city”.  She doesn’t suffer fools gladly, but maybe she’ll soften up to Luka and Rolo. 
 And Many More!

Beacon Pines is a simple mountain town caught between the past and the future. Some cling to the past while others try to cover it up. Change is bubbling, the sort of change that can dredge up old secrets.
It’s been hard times for Beacon Pines ever since the old Valentine’s Fertilizer plant shut down, after the accident. Most folks seem content with forgetting that it ever happened. But for Luka, it's personal.
People mostly keep to themselves, which is a shame really, because if they talked to each other they might realize that strange things are happening in Beacon Pines. Earthquakes, strange lights in the night, folks going missing, creatures lurking in the shadows, glowing puddles, and strange men in hazmat suits who seem very interested in it all. 






We're a bit scattered around the globe, but who isn't these days? Our scrappy team of 3 has been working together for a few years now, and are excited to share Beacon Pines with the world!
There must be something in the water in the Netherlands that produced great artists! Ilse has managed to create not only all of the wonderful characters - but the entire town of Beacon Pines - based only on quick brainstorming sessions with the team. Working as a remote group isn't exactly easy, but few things are more enjoyable than waking up, looking in dropbox, and finding more amazing art for Beacon Pines. 
Ever since a young age when a family friend gave Matt a dusty guitar from their attic, he's been writing music. He started programming his own games as a direct route to becoming a video game composer. What better way to get your music in a game... than to make your own game? After winning an IGF award for his music in the game Ephemerid, Matt decided to continue making his own games, featuring his own music. 
Our resident word-nerd. After joining the team to help with game design, it became clear that Brent would play an important role in developing the story of Beacon Pines. He brings with him inspiration from the pulp mystery novels he read as a kid, as well as the inexhaustible drive to discover the perfect bad joke.



The groundwork for the game is already in place.  We've got the core mechanics hammered out, a custom scripting engine that we use to write all of the story and events, lots of art and music, and the first two chapters of gameplay complete.
Custom scripting engine makes it super easy to add dialog, animations, sounds, etc!
So, we've made it past a lot of the big roadblocks already.  The main thing left to do is finish the content for the game. Still, that's a big thing. Let's break it down into chunks, as that will also show where the funding will go if this Kickstarter succeeds:
Up to this point, the game has been completely self-funded. We've used earnings from previous games and side jobs to get us this far. Any funding we receive from this Kickstarter (after fees, taxes, and rewards are fulfilled) will go directly into development of the game. If we're lucky, we might even raise enough bring on a community manager which will free us up to focus even more on making the game as good as it can be!
Obligatory behind the scenes 2d/3d representation ;-)
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The mechanics and systems of the game are pretty much feature-complete. And a fair chunk of the story and scripting is already written. However, there is still a lot of story to be told.

The biggest challenge going forward will be good-old-fashioned content creation. We have a complex and twisting story to tell about Beacon Pines, and lots of characters still to introduce. The majority of our time going forward will be dedicated to creating the remaining music, art, writing, and animations to complete the tale of Beacon Pines.

Nintendo Switch: We have access to Nintendo Switch dev kits and will begin developing for switch as soon as the Kickstarter succeeds (fingers crossed!). That being said, we are fully aware that releasing on consoles involves lots of additional certification and testing. If at any point we think we'll need help hitting the deadline for Switch, we will reach out to a reputable third party to help out with the process (we've spoken with a few already).
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Reusability and recyclability
For the acrylic charms and standees, we've chosen an eco-friendly manufacturer who only uses 100% recycled and recyclable acrylics that are completely VOC and HFC free. The sticker sheets are made from responsibly sourced papers from managed woodlands and are 100% PVC free and 100% recyclable. We're looking for similarly environmentally-friendly manufacturers for the remaining physical rewards.
Sustainable Distribution
Similar to the manufacturing of charms, standees, and sticker sheets, the producer packages these items in bubble wrap made from 100% recycled, 100% biodegradable paper and seals those packages with 100% recyclable, brown paper tape. We'll keep in mind these high standards for sustainability when repackaging any items and choosing other manufacturers.

updates.update_userinfo: LudoNarraCon Complete, Reward Updates, and a Simple Request
updates.update_content:
LudoNarraCon Complete
The LudoNarraCon Steam event went great! The 3 live streams were fun, and we might put those up on youtube at some point for those who missed it. In the meantime, here are some images from the art stream:

LudoNarraCon Begins Today!
If you are a fan of narrative focused games (and we know you are), then you'll want to check out LudoNarraCon. I mentioned in the last update that Beacon Pines will be featured in the event, and it starts today at noon Central Time and lasts until Monday.  The Beacon Pines team will be doing streams on Steam at 1pm Central time each of the four days, so please stop by and join us!

Event Announcement!
It's finally time to let you know about the event we've been teasing out. Beacon Pines will be a featured game at LudoNarraCon this year! We've been fans of LudoNarraCon from it's inception, so it's really exciting to see Beacon Pines featured this year! This digital convention is presented by Fellow Traveller, and showcases the latest innovative games with a narrative focus. LudoNarraCon will be taking place on Steam from April 23rd to 26th and features free playable demos, live-streamed panel discussions, and lots of other great content from over 40 game exhibitors. We are very much honored to be included in this event, and we hope you'll join us at LudoNarraCon!

Introducing Kirsten Mize
In the previous update, I teased out an event announcement for today. It turns out we can't quite announce that yet. But we have another, just as exciting, announcement to make!  After a long and somewhat overwhelming process, we've selected Kirsten Mize to be the voice of the Book/Narrator in Beacon Pines:

campaign.story:
Everafter Falls is a casual, relaxing and enjoyable experience both in solo or co-op mode. 
Everafter Falls is a mix of Stardew Valley/Harvest Moon/Animal Crossing with some Action RPG elements found in the dungeons, all held together with a tightly written story. 
You wake up to discover the life you previously had on Earth was nothing but a simulation. With no memory of this place, you will explore and rediscover the serene and peaceful existence you once had here. Welcome to Everafter Falls.
While you were gone, some things have gone a little astray. Find out why you are needed and what lies in store. Players can complete the game at their own pace and will have an option to continue playing indefinitely even after finishing the core story.

A Pet that will always be by your side...
Your pet comes with 2 basic abilities - Dig and Water. This design decision reduces the amount of tools cluttering up your inventory and makes possible some other interesting mechanics.
Your pet can be taught new abilities. Is your inventory full while traversing the dungeons but you don't want to travel back to town? Send your pet to town to sell off its inventory while you continue exploring.

Need to get out of a tight situation or just reduce travelling time? Yes, Pet teleportation is a thing on Everafter Falls. 
Pet Teleportation is a learnable skill
Grow a huge range of fruits and vegetables
Everafter Falls host a large variety of crops and plants, with some strange and unique species not found on Earth. Discovering and acquiring some of these may not be easy, but will be a rewarding experience. Below is a preview of what you will find in the game, with plans for more to come. 
Harvestable fruit and vegetables
All crops have a good number of visually distinct growth stages so that you know where they are in their growth cycle.
A preview of crop growth stages
Trees fruit at different rates and have a different maximum fruit capacity depending on variety. Waiting until they bear the maximum amount of fruit will yield more fruit over time, compared to harvesting as soon as the first fruits emerge. Discover what other methods can be used to increase fruit yields even further!
Mushrooms can be found in the wild or grown with the right equipment
Craft various drones to help you with farm work, fishing, and general support. Each drone can be enhanced with up to 3 Drone Parts, giving them extra functionality. Support Drones are unique in that they can be equipped and will follow you around.
A Water Drone automatically waters your crops
Choose drone parts to modify drones to suit your needs
A support drone can be equipped to provide extra inventory slots and additional firepower for the Dungeons.
Something I have not spent much time on yet are the farm animals. I plan to have around 5-8 different species that can be bred and will produce valuable goods. Some species may not be familiar to ones on Earth.

One species that has already been decided on is the the Alpaca. I could not resist working on this first. You'll be able to harvest super soft wool from them.
Farm Alpacas for their soft, soft wool
A behind-the-scenes look at animating these little fellas.
What are Pixies?
Pixies are tiny little helpers that can be caught. They can then be placed on various things for different effects. You can sustainably harvest stone from rocks and wood from trees without destroying them using Blue Pixies. Green Pixies will help increase the growth rates of any plant or speed up processing times for the machines you craft! Discover what rare Red Pixies can do - if you ever catch one.
Pixies can harvest resources like wood and stone without destroying the tree or rock

How to catch Pixies
Pixies can be caught by placing edible offerings inside Pixie Shrines. Check back the following day to see if you find a pixie inside it. The quality of the offering and location of the pixie shrine will determine the chances of attracting a Pixie and also type pixie caught. Shrines can be crafted, however, the town center has a Golden Shrine that, once restored, can be used to attract rarer Pixies.
Discover what else pixies can do when you discover them
Restore structures around town and put them to good use
Discover Cards along the way and eat them to gain their powers.
Character progression is handled by earning cards either by completing quests or through special events. More often than not, you will be presented with 3 to choose from so you can decide what direction you want to take that best suits your playstyle. Will you choose cards that help you maximize profits from your farm, or strengthen your skills in combat so you can dive deeper into the dungeons?
Card choices direct character progression
After choosing a card, you'll need to eat it. How else are you going to gain it's powers?
Tastes like cardboard
Explore the peaceful town and meet its inhabitants. Attend festivals, celebrate special events, find hidden areas and help restore things back to their former glory.
One of many areas in town to explore
Penguin Post
All mail in Everafter Falls is delivered through Penguin Post. Pip and Pepper are the penguins that run this service and use carrier Pigeons to do the delivery. Every now and again, you may find a pigeon who has forgotten how to fly. Bring it to the post office where Pip and Pepper (the penguins who run the joint) will give it a job delivering mail.
Mail being delivered by pigeons who have forgotten how to fly
Gradually Changing Seasons
For a more immersive experience, trees change at different rates when the season changes. This small touch not only increase diversity in the environment, but provides a visual cue for when a season is ending and a new one starting.
Trees will change at different rates to indicate the coming of a new season
Personalize your experience and create the character you want to play with many options to choose from.
Character Creation
Make your home yours
There are many types of decorations to find and collect to make your home unique. Below are some examples from each category.
Customize your home with a huge variety of items
Fine tuned decorations, place anything for display on shelves and tables.
Not only can you decorate your house with various furniture including floor furniture, rugs and wall items (clocks, windows), you can also choose what to display on all shelves and tables. In addition to this, most furniture can have its color changed using a potion dye crafted from some unique fruit species.
Fishing and The Town Aquarium
Everafter Falls is a host to many kinds of fish, some you will be unfamiliar with. The Town Aquarium has recently undergone repairs and needs your help to repopulate it. Receive special rewards for collecting as many types as you can.
Fishing is a lucrative business here in Everafter Falls
The town aquarium can showcase every type of fish you've caught
A large number of marine species to discover for those who love to collect!
Combat in this genre has been the area most lacking and I hope to change that trend. Everafter Falls features a dungeon with many levels and lots of enemies to encounter.
The game will have a moderate level of progressing difficulty and will be somewhat challenging if players want to focus solely on traversing the dungeons. For those who prefer a more casual approach, if enough time is spent doing other activities and progressing in other areas of the game, players will acquire items and abilities that can make fighting enemies a breeze.
Taking down enemies is a breeze with help from your Pet and a Support Drone.
Preview of some monsters you'll encounter in the dungeons
Item Drops with random stat generation
Discover unique and powerful items that can help you on your adventure. Items can boost combat stats, or increase farm productivity. They can provide bonuses to your card levels, drones, and pet skills. Enjoy the thrill of finding ultra rare and unique items.
Equipable Items with random stat generation
On this adventure, you'll meet a lot of fun and strange characters along the way. Complete fun and wacky quests to uncover their stories and earn items that will help you on your journey. 
Many characters are waiting to share their stories with you.
Everafter Falls will not have a bachelor/bachelorette system (you are the only human here). Such a system would be difficult to reason for as the intricate relationships between the characters and player is tightly bound to the story. Have fun learning about the characters and their lives and perhaps they may share intimate moments with you if you've earned enough of their trust.
Complete important quests for great rewards.
You’ll be able to make some neat stuff that will help you make other neat stuff! There will be a huge number of items to discover, craft, produce, and refine. Below is a small preview of crafting and equipment processing.
Craft and create machines to help you process items into other valuable and useful goods.
A relaxing, fun, and memorable soundtrack
Everafter Falls will have an Original Soundtrack composed by Tim Carlos. He has already produced some outstanding tracks for the game, please have a listen below. All pledges above the "Post Pigeon" tier will receive the Original Soundtrack digitally.
 If you enjoy what you hear, you can find more about Tim through his website  TimCarlos.com or follow him on Twitter  @tflatminor 

 **Please note that I have mistakenly put "Digital Copy of the Game" and then "Digital Copy of the game at a discounted price" under Pledge Rewards for the "Kickstarter Pricing" tier. Please note only 1 copy of the game is given at this price. 
Reference chart for pledge tiers and rewards
Below is a preview of the exclusive in-game posters, these can only be redeemed by backers with a provided code and cannot be obtained otherwise. Please visit Penguin Post in-game and submit your code. The item will be sent to you via a delivery pigeon!
Preview of Excusive in-game Poster Rewards
The game will be released for PC/Mac/Linux first via Steam in March 2022, with the Nintendo Switch version following several months later. I would love to release on all platforms/consoles, however, as a solo developer, I need to ensure I don't spread myself too thinly to keep the project manageable. The possibility of Playstation and Xbox releases will likely be considered after the game has been released on the Nintendo Switch.
Backers can choose to receive their digital copy of the game on for any available platform but please be aware of the different planned release dates. These are fairly conservative dates but are still estimates and may change.
Alpha testing is planned to start mid 2021, and the Beta testing towards the end of 2021.
The Digital Art Book will include exclusive WIP images, character designs and some fantastic artwork commissioned by various artists.
Commissioned artwork by Daniel Bogni
Commissioned artwork by Jamsino
I was raised in Australia, but was born in Cambodia. My family and I were lucky enough to have immigrated to Australia during the Khmer Rouge era. I am very fortunate to have had the education I had in Australia, without it, I wouldn't be in the position I am now.
I moved back to Cambodia at the age of 32 hoping for a new direction in life. Thanks to the lower cost of living, moving back here has afforded me the opportunity to work almost full time on this game for nearly 3 years now.
These last 3 years have been spent juggling game development, freelance design work, and being a father to my now 2 year old son.
I chose to do this Kickstarter so I can focus on doing what I love, which is working on this game. Additionally, It would help me with funding for the Original  Soundtrack. I am also hoping to create a community of fans that can provide feedback and help shape the game into the best it can be.
All the core systems have been completed and are in a playable state, with a decent amount of content complete. Much more content is planned, and a lot more time needs to be spent on the combat/dungeons. 
I set out from the very start to create a game I would enjoy, in a genre that has rekindled my love for gaming. I have poured a lot of love and energy into making it what it is today. A successful campaign will take a load off my shoulders and provide enough funding to last the rest of development.
I am extremely grateful for anyone backing this project, with your support, I hope to develop a game that will provide you many hours of wholesome fun. Thank you so much!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Having poured everything in into this project for nearly 3 years now, I am fully aware of the difficulties and challenges faced with developing and shipping a game alone.

After going public with the game a couple of months ago, I've been overwhelmed with the positive response and show of support. I aim to do my best to release a game that will not disappoint.

I originally aimed for a release date at the end of 2021, however, have since pushed it back to mid 2022 to be a little more conservative with timing and to better meet expectations for the launch date.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: An update about the status of the development of Everafter Falls
updates.update_content:
Firstly, I'd like to wish everyone a happy new year and hope you all have had a great start to the year.
I apologize for the lack of updates as I have had a little bit of a tough time with Covid forcing nurseries to close where I am. I've been struggling a little trying to take care of my Son by myself at the moment. The nurseries have recently opened up again the past week, I've managed to spend what time I have making as much progress on the game as I can.

updates.update_userinfo: Fishing Minigame, Tilling soil/watering simultaneously with your pet, and working on art assets
updates.update_content:
Thanks to the 1347 people who helped Everafter Falls reach 150% funded.
We've also manage to hit the additional Pet stretch goal which means you'll have the option to choose your trusty sidekick when you embark on this adventure!

I absolutely adore the community that has built up around the game - your excitement, dedication and support so far has been more than I could ever dream of.  I have been itching to get back to working on the game and showing off some new updates, I will be posting development progress as Kickstarter updates to keep you all informed.

updates.update_userinfo: 150% Funded and our Pet stretch goal reached! Plus fanart winners announced!
updates.update_content:
There have been some amazing entries for the Fan Art contest, I've been blown away by all the time and dedication people have spent on creating some really great artwork of the game.

It has been a surreal experience for me seeing world and characters in the game come to life via the hands talent of other people. I hadn't given much thought about this aspect of game development when starting this project, but it is a very humbling experience.

updates.update_userinfo: The Everafter Falls Fan Art contest ends and Voting begins!
updates.update_content:
We've reached 100%, thank you so much to everyone who has helped the campaign succeed, either through backing or help spreading the word.

I just want to let you know how much this means to me.
Working on this game alone has been a hugely rewarding experience, but also an extremely challenging one.

campaign.story:
Game Informer took a look at 12 minutes of gameplay! "She's got pumpkin boobs, how is that not game of the year?" :P Thank you Kim, Alex, Jeff, and Liana!
 https://youtu.be/q6hYVrCjos8 

UPDATE: You can now play as female Drac! Thank YOU for all your feedback!
Romancelvania is a visually stunning action RPG coming to Switch/PS4/PS5/Steam/XboxSeriesX/XboxSeriesS that features in-depth weapon and magic based combat, exploration based platforming, and a cast of gorgeous monsters that you won’t be able to resist.
Most foes don't stand a chance against Drac's arsenal of powers, including Impale.
Increase your powers by feeding on human "Production Assistants" who throw themselves at Drac, the star of the show.
Coming to Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5, XBoxSeriesX/S and Steam
 Introducing the Thirsty Metroidvania - Romance your way across Transylvania, encounter absurd monsters, craft weapons, learn magic, and more.
 Build your castle - Grow the party mansion as you convince more cast members to move in, and decide where monsters live to get stat and skill bonuses. 
 Enjoy the Showmance - Take the cast members on outlandish dates, massage your sweetheart to unlock more conversation options, and spend time getting to know these supernatural hotties.
Fight or flirt with the Van Helsings?
You play as the legendary playboy vampire himself, Drac, as he battles and romances his way across Transylvania. After being reluctantly recruited by the Grim Reaper to star in a “reality dating show,” he's on a mission to find the world's most eligible monsters, get them to move into his party mansion, and restore his former glory by killing everything in his path along the way.
Things are about to get...spicy.
 ANNOUNCING: Limited Run physical copies!
Like top-shelf physical copies? The mighty Gods at Limited Run have you covered!
It wouldn't be a reality show without DRAMAAAAAA! And our diverse cast brings the goods. Inspired by everything from mythology, classic Universal monsters, to...Jersey Shore? Here are some of the wild monsters Drac will need to wine and dine.
Oh, you think that's all? Oh no, no, no. We have lots more over-the-top reality show monsters in store for you. Stay tuned as we reveal more characters!

Update! Introducing...Frank(enstein)
Enemy turned cast member (and potential love interest!). Be careful though...he's a monster before he's had his coffee.
What's a reality show without trouble? Clawdia, the show's werecheetah is a vortex of disorder. Like most cats.
When the Grim Reaper notices his best client, Drac, has lost his bloodlust for the afterlife, he sets Drac up with a reality TV show to try to get his groove back. Drac must now traverse the perilous countryside of Transylvania on a hunt for the world’s most eligible monsters. Once he has wooed them, they’ll move back into his party mansion, where their rowdy exploits will be documented by the camera crew. Will Drac find “Love at first Bite”, or will he discover “Love Sucks”?
“Terrorizing the townsfolk just wasn’t fun anymore. Then Grim suggested putting the ‘lust’ back in bloodlust and I thought, you know what, he’s right.”
It should go without saying that Drac and Grim's relationship is...complicated. They're long-time (eons) bffs, but they also are, how shall we say, business associates. Drac brings Grim a lot of "business." And when Grim notices Drac is not producing the same numbers he used to, well, it was time for drastic measures.
The thirst is strong with this one.
Grim offers to rebuild Drac's castle. When Drac appeases the mad creator with over-the-top combat and scintillating romance, Grim adds more rooms! As cast members move in, Drac can furnish their rooms to keep them happy and receive benefits, based on where the characters are slotted. You may feel a special connection to Ilessa, but really enjoy peppering enemies with Rat Darts, a Trick that Eden teaches you. You'll have to weigh growing your relationship vs your powers. Decisions, decisions!
Gothic castle or party mansion? Why not both? Choose carefully where you slot cast members.
Romancelvania includes a number of diverse lands to explore. From a desert made entirely of desserts like churro cacti, to the All Seeing Swamp where you can’t escape from the watchful eyes of Grim and his lackeys. 
We’re taking the combat and exploration of Metroidvanias and pairing them with the most appealing aspects of dating games. This allows us to merge the excitement of action platformers with meaningful narrative, taking both genres to new heights! Also, our "hub world" of the mansion allows players to choose their playstyle - if you prefer more dating, spend more time in the mansion and have every conversation possible! If you'd rather get back to the action, use the hubworld sparingly and just grab quests and essentials there. We want to give the player choices in how they interact with Romancelvania's world!
Let's dig into some of the specifics.
Drac's signature weapon, The Impaler, in action! Here, Drac fights a pair of "Screaming Jellyfish" on a giant set Grim built. Grim goes to ridiculous lengths to bring a bit of flair to the combat and platforming.
Whip it good!
Drac’s signature weapon is “The Impaler,” a devastating long spear. He's grown quite accustomed to it over the centuries...to the point where Grim needs to offer a way to "mate" Drac's precious Impaler with other weapons Drac finds on his adventure. 
Drac simply needs to place the Impaler alongside the newly found weapon in the Weapon Motel, toss in a few crystals and voila...out pops in a new weapon born of the Impaler bloodline. Each new combination of weapon and crystal yields an exciting new tool!
Romancelvania’s upgrade system is a bit like the Horadric Cube in Diablo 2, or cooking in Breath of the Wild.
Drop in a weapon, toss in some crystals and “mate” your weapons.
Mate your weapons to take your combat to new heights!
By adding crystals into the slots in The Weapon Motel, players can imbue a new weapon with different traits, elemental effects, and other surprises.
Grim is after ratings. And there's no better way to win over the crowd than a flashy coup de grâce. You better bring your fighting game skills though - these attacks are performed by a special combination of key presses. 

Tricks are items that assist in combat by allowing for different attack patterns. They are meant to add spice and supplement weapon combat.
So long Big Chungus!
But with all this slaying, Drac's gotta find time to unwind...and get to know the cast so he can find the love of his afterlife! Romancelvania has a number of ways you can get close.
Whisk your castmates on extravagant dates around the world, or select the one who's stolen your cold, lifeless heart and profess your love on a special custom outing. 
We have a saying on the team "naughty not dirty." This is about building relationships. Even though we also "slay and lay" the game is much more about building tension and not about graphic nudity.
You are my wish.
We have numerous opportunities for conversation with each cast member, and you can get to discover what makes them tick. 
Sparks fly when Drac discovers his ex is one of the contestants.
Romancelvania thinks the key to your heart can be picked like a lock, so introducing: the Massage minigame. Is a character tense? Are they holding back? Offer a massage! If they accept, you can unlock new conversation and date options!
Become the master of unknotting!


Gigantic, over-the-top bosses are an integral part of Metroidvanias. They fit naturally in the reality TV show setting as obstacles Grim puts in front of Drac to help get higher ratings and excitement from the audience.
Here are a few of our boss fights:
Lulu Cthulhu

Giant Spaghetti Monster
What evil lurks at Grim's new favorite restaurant, the Meatball Garden?
Middle-aged Mutant Ninja Cerberus
Time to pull out the Rat Darts
The show has many production assistants. There are human sycophant "bloodbags" who volunteer their time (and well-being) for the good of the show. And perhaps most importantly of all, Battaboom - Drac's own personal assistant!  He will help you out in combat with a variety of ways, including serving as a pack mule and delivering Drac blood when he needs it most!
 Edit: Female Drac is no longer a stretch goal - but a reality! :) 
More to unlock as we go!
We've got some REWARDS, fam! From cool swag Geekify's creating for us, to Limited Run physical copies, we've got you COVERED! Check out the rewards below!
Don't forget - you can ADD ON to existing tiers, a Limited Run PHYSICAL COPY! All tiers, unless specified, include DIGITAL copies but all you need to do to get a physical copy is just hit the "add on" button. 


Limited Run Games is a Raleigh-based publisher founded in 2015 that focuses on preserving games in a physical format. Publishing over 300 games in its lifetime and winning awards for its bespoke Collector’s Editions, Limited Run is the gold standard in bringing digital-only games to physical form for casual fans and collectors alike. Visit limitedrungames.com for the latest offerings, or follow the brand on your social media platform of choice for all LRG-related updates: @limitedrungames.
Add-ons can only be added if you have selected the $60 level or more reward.
Simply add on whatever items you like to your pledge! We have some exciting stuff to offer. 
If you have any questions, feel free to shoot us a quick email at amanda@thedeependgames.com
 But wait, there's more! If you want to help promote Romancelvania, you can earn even more! Check out our Backer Achievements! 
The more you share, the more you earn!
Other folks who have lent a hand include: Art Director Ronin: Nate Wells, Keith Shetler, Mike Nevins, Joey Pagano, Amanda Kessler, Heriberto Calderon, Joseph Tavano, Jordan Kegler. I love you Ken.

We got by with a little help from our friends! We have been lucky enough to collaborate with many uber-talented companies.
Thank you Skymap Games. Your enormous talent and loyalty has been key in helping us juggle all that we have taken on thus far. 

Additionally, thank you to thank The Molasses Flood, and Beyond FX for lending a hand.

Epic Games was kind enough to award us an Epic Mega Grant. This is amazing! For years Epic has helped developers with amazing tools and resources. To be part of this prestigious honor bolsters our confidence and drives our creativity daily. 
We are honored and grateful to have been awarded COVID support funds from Sony PlayStation. Thank you for helping us build our dream game!
 Limited Run, you folks rock! We are elated to be working with you on this.
Aside from the AMAZING physical copies, Geekify is providing our physical Reward Tiers. We've worked with them in the past and they create some unbelievably cool goods you just have to get your hand on.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We love making games.

That said, these are strange times. While our team has made games before (BioShock, BioShock Infinite, Saints Row, Perception, etc), we haven't made one during a worldwide pandemic. 

But we have worked remotely. We made Perception from our basement. Time and again, we've been faced with unusual circumstances, and we've made better games for it. We believe Romancelvania will be one of these games to overcome the trying times and make something that will bring people joy.

This motivation, above all others, is what drives us.

In terms of timing: we are targeting late 2021. However, we are putting in March 2022 because we realize that development is unpredictable. It all depends on our funding amount - the more stretch goals we hit, the better. Ultimately, it is far more important to deliver a game that meets the expectations of our fans than to hit a date. We have already built a significant portion of the game, but we do have a lot of work to do. We have also spent years building up an incredible network of hugely talented individuals and companies who are chomping at the bit to help out more on the project. In short, every bit of additional funding goes toward adding more to the game. We have huge plans for Romancelvania and hope to build a world we can continue to expand upon in the future. 
 
We have carefully budgeted and planned this project and we pride ourselves on being brutally honest with ourselves. We will be working extremely hard to meet your expectations and we will keep you informed along the way. Thank you again for the opportunity to make this game happen!

updates.update_content:
Hello there Romancelvania community!
We realize it's been a hot minute since we have updated you, and we want to apologize for the delay in updates. Between the end of the school year, and the focus on a lot of new tech (e.g. we just implemented an entirely new conversation system!) we lost track of time. We have so much juicy content to catch you up on so hold onto your butts! Here's just a taste of some of the cool stuff we've been adding.

updates.update_userinfo: More on the lovely Nefret and details on a couple more enemies
updates.update_content:
Hi there Romancelvania community!
It's a new month which means it's time to give you some juicy updates!

Backerkit Pledges
First off, we wanted to let our Backerkit pre-order store backers know that we will be collecting your pledges this Friday. You don’t need to do anything, we just wanted to give you a head up. The store in the future will collect funds at the time of checkout. Thank you again for your support!

It’s update o’clock!
January was a busy month and we wanted to share some new content with you! As Grim would say, “Spill that tea!”
Backerkit info:
First off we wanted to communicate to the Backerkit backers super quick (KS people, you don’t need to read this section). We will tentatively be collecting your pledge funds in the next two or three weeks. Moving forward we will charge any Backerkit orders at the time of checkout. We will also communicate this through our social media channels and Discord right before we deduct the funds. Thank you for your support and patience! If anything should change. Keep an eye out here or any of our social media channels.

updates.update_userinfo: Happy holidays to the amazing Romancelvania community!
updates.update_content:
We wanted to take a moment and update you on a few things!

First off we want to welcome all the wonderful BackerKit backers to our community! We are so happy to have you along for the ride! We do want to communicate a few things just to the BackerKit preorder store backers. (Kickstarter backers you can skip ahead***). We at the moment are not collecting funds from your purchases, but we promise your orders are live. We will be collecting funds some time after the holidays. We will send out an update here on Kickstarter and our social media pages to give you a heads up on when we will collect, so make sure to check in :)

Hard to believe that it's been almost a week since we all geared up and created such a mind-blowing rally. We have not stopped gushing about what an amazing ride that was. We're elated that we were able to find such a passionate audience.
Over the past week, we have spent a bit of time recovering from that final push (and a month of super hard work!) We have also been planning, organizing feedback, talking with partners to help make the best game possible, and just gearing up again.

updates.update_userinfo: Love, passion, grit, determination, and community
updates.update_content:
That's the update. We actually did it and it's all thanks to YOU.
Lots to talk about, plan, celebrate, and create, but for now, know that we will be thanking you all for a long time coming. 

Today you have made dreams come true!

It's only been a few HOURS but WOW has the landscape changed! We are 88% funded, fam! And this is thanks to YOU! We have received COUNTLESS messages of support, little notes about how you've upgraded your pledges, tweets about how you've asked friends to support us.
We. Are. Blown. Away. 
Thank you, thank you, thank you. You've given us this second wind!

updates.update_userinfo: 88% funded! New add ons! Let's GOOOOOO!
updates.update_content:
Guys, this thing may just be possible! Our incredible backers on our Discord server realized that if everyone upped their pledge by just a bit - right now, $18, we'd fund this thing!
We know it's a hard time right now for a lot of people - 2020 has been a garbage fire and a half - but if you are able to toss in an additional $18, we could make it and not have to go with Plan B! 
So shout it from the rooftops! Whisper it in DM's! Toss in the cost of a pizza and we'll make it worth your while! GO TEAM GO!
